author: marita r
title: Excellent hotel ... will return
text:
Service of the staff was second to none, everyone we had contact with was so friendly + helpful. Room om the 1st floor was very modern, very clean + quiet. The whole hotel is very modern + clean. Only 1 slight niggle was even with the temperature at 28 (highest) it was a little chilly for me. Lovely hot showers, tea + coffee in the room. Beds super comfy + lovely fluffy towels. I didn't go to the pool personally, but my partner said it was a bit cold for him.
Despite being a little chilly, the hotel is in a fantastic location; literally a minute walk from Lambeth North tube station + 5 minutes walk from Westminster Bridge (Parliament, Big Ben, Dungeons, London Eye). I would definitely return to this hotel in the future.
